sentences.cn: 粘土会有有用的营养元素.

sentences.en: Every individual has a physiological requirement for each nutrient.
sentences.cn: 每个人对每种营养成分都有一种生理上的需要.

sentences.en: He called his cleaning method the nutrient film technique.
sentences.cn: 他称他的清洁方法为“滋养膜法”.

sentences.en: If gases from pressure tanks are bubbled through the nutrient, only quality gasses should be used.
sentences.cn: 要是气体通过营养液由压力桶冒出, 则只有高质量的气体才能使用.

sentences.en: Magnesium is the nutrient element in plant growth.
sentences.cn: 镁是植物生长的营养要素.

sentences.en: Nitrogen as a plant nutrient is treated in a great number of publications.
sentences.cn: 人们对植物营养中的氮素研究已发表相当大量的报告.

sentences.en: Nutrient reserves depend much on the nature of the soil and how it has been used.
sentences.cn: 土壤中养分的含量主要取决于土壤的性质及养分利用的方式.

sentences.en: Sulfur is an essential nutrient for plants.
sentences.cn: 硫是植物的一种重要的营养元素.

sentences.en: Temperature also affects the rate of decomposition and thus the nutrient flux rate.
sentences.cn: 温度还会影响分解的速度,从而影响养分流的速度.

sentences.en: The plant absorbs nutrients from the soil.
sentences.cn: 植物从土壤中吸取养分。

sentences.en: The potato is a good nutrient medium for many bacteria.
sentences.cn: 马铃薯对许多细菌是一种良好的培养基.

sentences.en: The roots transmit moisture and nutrient to the trunk and branches.
sentences.cn: 根将水分和养料输送到干和枝.

sentences.en: The soil water and nutrient relationships are closely interrelated and should be examined together.
sentences.cn: 土壤水分和养分是紧密联系的,应当一起研究.

sentences.en: There is still great interest in boron as an essential plant nutrient.
sentences.cn: 迄今硼作为植物的必要营养元素仍极其重要.

sentences.en: This overall deterioration in soil structure is usually accompanied by a reduced nutrient retention capacity.
sentences.cn: 这种土壤结构的全面恶化,通常伴随着养份保持能力的降低.

sentences.en: This represents a substantial measure of nutrient conservation in soil and vegetation systems.
sentences.cn: 这一点正是在土壤植被系统中保持养分的实质措施.

sentences.en: To examine the global impact of acidification, the researchers developed a series of world maps to show current coal use, nutrient consumption, and copper production and smelting by country.
sentences.cn: 为检验酸性化过程对全球的影响，研究者们描绘出一系列世界地图来展示近期煤炭利用、营养消费和铜矿生产、冶炼的国家。

words.tran_cn: 有营养的；滋养的；有营养成份的；与营养有关的
营养物；促进生长的东西

phrases.tran_cn: 营养元素；肥料要素，养分元素

trans.tran_cn: 营养物，营养品，养分，养料，滋养物
trans.tran_en: a chemical or food that provides what is needed for plants or animals to live and grow
